text.headline: Candidates
text.text:
Te Arai - South

7 Mile Beach

La Réserve Golf Links

Ban Rakat Club - Ballyshear

Terras da Comporta Dunas

Cabot St. Lucia

Tree Farm

McArthur West

Sand Valley - Lido

text.headline: Te Arai - South
text.text: Te Arai - South built by Coore Crenshaw in New Zealand opened in 2023.

text.headline: 7 Mile Beach
text.text: 7 Mile Beach built by Clayton DeVries Pont in Hobart, Tasmania, Australia expected in 2023

text.headline: La Réserve Golf Links
text.text: La Réserve Golf Links built in Bel Ombre, Mauritius by Peter Matkovich with co-design credit to Louis Oosthuizen opened September 2022. La Reserve will be the new host venue for the DP World Tour’s AfrAsia Bank Mauritius Open.

text.headline: Ban Rakat Club - Ballyshear
text.text: Ban Rakat Club - Ballyshear built by Hanse in Thailand opened in 2022

text.headline: Terras da Comporta Dunas
text.text: Terras da Comporta Dunas built by David Kidd in Portugal opens in 2022

text.headline: Cabot St. Lucia
text.text: Cabot St. Lucia built by Coore Crenshaw in St. Lucia expected in 2023

text.headline: Tree Farm
text.text: Tree Farm built by Goalby Blair Doak in South Carolina, USA opened in 2023

text.headline: McArthur West
text.text: McArthur West built by Coore Crenshaw in Florida, USA expected in 2023

text.headline: Sand Valley Lido
text.text: Sand Valley Lido built by Doak Schneider Slawnik in Wisconsin, USA opneed in 2023
